title: Ranked 3v3 Team Points Farming (Any rank, I don't care)
body:
**This is only for farming team points**, not worrying about our team rank, which is why **I don't care about your elo** (but please have your solo queue placements done, or have played ranked last season** [basically people who have played a lot of ranked this season or season's before, so you know much effort it takes to win a match**])
All I ask is that we put in our time to try and win games for points, this will take several days to a week.
**It's also good to mention that you can't lose points**. 
Along with getting the end season rewards, we can also use the 3v3 ranked system to improve.

**If we get enough players, we can play 5v5s ranked teams and get triple the points**

Add me on NA: Snow Kangaroo

replies.body: I don't really like doing 3v3 (Since it only gives 1 point per win), but if you make a ranked 5's I'm willing to Sup (G5).

> [{quoted}](name=Drop It Low,realm=EUW,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=hF97ZiUo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-18T12:27:25.345+0000)
>
> add me

Sorry, this is an NA team.
